events.content: Need rec letters for an NSF internship. How far out should I ask professors?
Career Center recommends three to four weeks minimum.
Exactly. Send your resume, transcript, and a bullet list of traits to highlight. Include the due date and submission links.
Should we follow up if we donâ€™t hear back?
Give a polite reminder one week before the deadline.
